title: Weather Wizards: Floods
description: One of the most common hazards that severe weather creates is flooding. Because of climate change, flooding is becoming more common and more severe. Weather Wizards: Floods introduces students to the causes and effects of floods as well as the advanced technology that helps to keep millions of people safe from floods. The book can also be used to teach students how to ask and answer questions to understand text as well as identify and use homophones.
highFrequencyWords: barriers, dangerous, hazards, levees, overflow, predict, severe, stilts, structures
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
